title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.27 - Sanitary facilities for patrons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4003.27 - Sanitary facilities for patrons

State Regulations

Each racing association shall on every racing day
provide and maintain in a strictly sanitary condition such adequate toilets and
facilities for furnishing drinking water for its patrons and persons having
business at the track as may be reasonably required by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4003.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
